title: Casmaria atlantica
text:
Casmaria atlantica is a <a href="species">species</a> of large <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a <a href="marine%20%28ocean%29">marine</a> <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Cassidae">Cassidae</a>, the helmet snails and bonnet snails.
Description.
The maximum recorded <a href="gastropod%20shell">shell</a> length is 45 mm.
Habitat.
The minimum recorded depth for this species is 7 m; the maximum recorded depth is 30 m.
